name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reintroduce Google Maps links in Search

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension brings back all clickable links from Google Search to Google Maps (map thumbnail). Removed by European Union.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This simple extension brings back all clickable links from Google Search to Google Maps (map thumbnail). They have been removed following an European Union decision. This extension has been thoroughly tested in France (domain google.com).

The difference with the other "re-introduce" extension on the Chrome Web Store is that my extension enable the thumbnail link even when you search GPS coordinates. The other one only works for places/cities.
